viewData.name: ASUS 13.3" ZenBook S UX391FA Multi-Touch Laptop
viewData.short_description: Buy ASUS 13.3" ZenBook S UX391FA Multi-Touch Laptop featuring 1.8 GHz Intel Core i7-8565U Quad-Core, 16GB LPDDR3 | 512GB NVMe PCIe M.2 SSD 13.3" 3840 x 2160 4K UHD Display. Review ASUS
viewData.long_description: The 13.3" ZenBook S UX391FA Multi-Touch Laptop from ASUS is a lightweight, portable system designed for users who are constantly on-the-go. Specs-wise, it's built with a 1.8 GHz Intel Core i7-8565U quad-core processor, 16GB of LPDDR3 memory, and a 512GB NVMe PCIe M.2 SSD. With these combined, the ZenBook S can efficiently multitask and quickly load applications. Its 13.3" display is built with NanoEdge bezels and features a 3840 x 2160 4K UHD resolution. Other integrated features include Thunderbolt 3 and USB Type-C connectivity, 802.11ac Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 5.0, a fingerprint reader, a webcam, microphone, speakers, and a combo audio jack. The operating system installed is Windows 10 Pro.
